title: The Trail Life Podcast
description: The Trail Life Podcast focuses on the journey of trail running, how people got here, their experience, and what they can teach to other individuals in the trail community. Welcome to the Trail Life!!

title: Burpee Nation
description: Welcome to Burpee Nation! Your go-to podcast for talk on OCR (Obstacle Course Racing), running and even some CrossFit. We'll bring you episodes that include race and gear reviews, athlete interviews, tips, workouts and much more. So pour that post-race beer, sit back, relax and listen in!

title: Flow State Performance Podcast
description: Exploring all things peak performance.

title: In the Garage With Track Guy
description:
Mike Jay is a diehard track & field and cross country fanatic, and when it comes to his garage: it’s a shrine for those sports he loves. Surrounding his grandfather’s 1963 Chevy II are walls covered with memorabilia commemorating the events he has been a part of, signed gifts from athletes/coaches he adores, and press box signage he may or may not have snuck out of the venue in his bag.

So, when it comes to a “studio” to host a track & field and cross county centered podcast – The Garage is the perfect spot! Whether you, too, are a T&F/XC fan, or someone wanting to know more about the folks involved in these sports: this podcast should be a great listen for you. We hope you enjoy the episodes we have to offer. Thanks for listening!

title: COFFEE CLUB
description: A few runner bois sitting down drinking coffee and having a chat. We would love for you to join.

title: Femmi Pod
description: Welcome to the Femmi Pod. Femmi is a female based coaching company. We are focused on empowering females to embrace their physiology. At Femmi we are building a community of women who can support, inspire and educate one another on how to move with our bodies and not against them. Founders, Lydia O’Donnell and Esther Keown, have come together to kick start more conversations about females, how we can make the most of our bodies, our hormones and ourselves.

title: Fogdog and Basten
description:
Adam Fogg is an All-American, running professionally for Under Armour and Isaac Basten is an All-American at Drake University. Listen to the podcast to learn more about their stories and what their life as runners is like.
@adam_fogg @isaacbasten

title: Me las Piri
description: El podcast de nieve y montaña del Pirineo francés que te permite conocer sus 39 estaciones de esquí así como los lugares, las rutas y los mejores planes para descubrir y vivir la cara bonita del Pirineo.

title: The W Club
description:
The W (dub) Club is a podcast dedicated to supporting sports at *Stephen F. Austin State University such as women's basketball, volleyball, bowling, track & field and more! #SupportWomenInSports #PlayLikeALadyjack 

*not affiliated with Stephen F. Austin State University

title: Local Legends in Running
description: Welcome to the Local Legends in Running Podcast where you hear the stories from local legends of Australian running, that you simply always wanted to hear. The intention of this podcast is to have genuine and insightful conversations with Australian runners and coaches to simply educate the local running community and raise the profile of running in this country. So tune in to hear how running has shaped the lives of the guests and how it can shape yours.

title: SHOW PANA HAĎÁKA
description: Pan Haďák ve své show zpovídá osobnosti, vycházející hvězdy a legendy POŽÁRNÍHO SPORTU. Pořad plný zábavy, zajímavých informací a také alkoholu.

title: Couch to Q
description: If you look up, "How to run a 5k?" you will be met with training plans titled "How to run your first 5k: Couch To 5k". Couch to Q follows a similar idea, this podcast was born with the goal of spreading Track and Field and building a stronger following for Global Athletics by introducing listeners to the basics and essentials of this sport.

title: Outlandish
description: Outlandish is a podcast for trail runners and other outlandish folk. Hosted by Ed Scott, Outlandish focuses on the burgeoning trail running scene in London and Southeast England.

title: Estadio Trail
description: Programa en el que repasamos temas de actualidad, carreras, corredores, clasificaciones, etc. del mundo del trail running y las carreras por montaña.

title: The Roxzone Podcast
description: The Roxzone is a podcast hosted by avid HYROX enthusiasts Ben, Max and Tom. The trio cover current HYROX news, speak to interesting guests and explore the business behind the fastest growing fitness movement. Use discount code ROXZONE-10 for 10% off ALL your HYROX races.

title: Crester: A Purposeful Life, Driven By Endurance
description:
Join Pat and Dan as they dive into the world of endurance sport, Naval Aviation and whatever happens to grab their attention this week!

Email any questions or feedback to cresterpodcast@gmail.com.

title: Gab's Oval Office
description:
Everyone has different perspectives and experiences in the grand sport of running. This podcast will aim to learn from professionals, but also the future (college and younger). Think about this as an intersection between intriguing dialogue and fun!

My name is Gabe, aka "Gab", a college DIII runner and will try my best for something to resonate with you! Enjoy.

title: WeTrail - Run. Hike. Train
description:
פודקאסט טרייל - כל מה שרציתם לשמוע על השטח ולא העזתם לשאול.
סידרת הפודקאסטים של מועדון WeTrail.

title: El Stake-out
description:
El podcast del mushing en España.
Un espacio dedicado a compartir experiencias, aprendizajes y buenas prácticas de mushing.
El Stake-out lo formamos una comunidad de personas unidas por una misma pasión y desde unos mismos valores:

– Practicar deporte junto a nuestras manadas.
– Disfrutar de la naturaleza.
– Aprender y mejorar sobre las buenas prácticas, metodologías y cuidados.

https://wina.es/el-stake-out/

title: Life Endurance Podcast
description:
Welcome to the life endurance podcast, where we study methods of unlocking your true potential and explore the greatest endurance race we all partake in, LIFE!

Hosted by Austin Shadle, an engineer, endurance athlete, proud dog dad, and self development enthusiast.

title: Hardest Geezer Podcast
description: The journey to become the first person ever to run the full length of Africa

title: El camino del oso
description:
Espacio intimo donde narro mi iniciación en el mundo del running. 
Sensaciones, material, experiencias en este espacio entre tu y yo.
¿Me acompañes en esta aventura?

title: PXP Let's Talk Success
description: Welcome! Join Paul and Dre in discussing hot topics, past & future successes/failures, and much more! We are extremely excited to present our new podcast to all members and anyone who has access to podcast platforms. Our podcast is designed for triathletes, runners, cyclists, swimmers, and really any athlete or individual looking to improve physical and mental fitness. Paul has unlimited stories from members and why not share those stories with you for inspiration, motivation, and to know the phenomenal people you’re surrounded by. Dre will be helping unravel the brilliant mind of our very own coach, Paul. With Paul’s vast array of knowledge, Dre will ask questions and lead a casual conversation to help spread what Paul knows in order to deliver information on how you can achieve your goals more efficiently.

title: INTERSPORT Pro Specialist - Podcast Series
description: We welcome you to the podcast series by INTERSPORT PRO Specialists.

title: Tin Talk
description: Tin Talk is an open platform for the athletes and friends of Tinman Elite. We’ll discuss recent races, catch up on life, and banter about the latest in the running world.

title: ATHLETE.X Podcast
description: The ATHLETE.X Podcast brings you high quality content related to speed, power, and strength. If you want to run faster and be a more explosive athlete, the ATHLETE.X Podcast is for you.

title: The Riverside Run Club
description: An hour of good music, quizzing and guests to keep you company while you're out running. Each episode starts about 6 minutes in. Enjoy!

title: The Running Brunch
description: Two friends bringing runners of all levels to the table to talk about the good, the bad, and ugly of running AND of brunch

title: Dogghouse Couch Podcast
description: Avi, Andrew, Ryan and Robby get together to recap the events of the week in the dingy town of Worcester, Massachusets.

title: The Point 99 Podcast
description:
Welcome to The Point 99 Podcast, a podcast for runners by runners. Our aim is to share our hot takes on all things running, sharing our running journeys and ultimate running goals. Hopefully along the way we can gain small insights into the running lives of some of the awesome people within the running community, the highs, lows and everything in between.

Be sure to subscribe, comment and let us know what you think via our social media channels:

Instagram: @the_point99_podcast
Email: thepoint99podcast@gmail.com

title: The Wall
description: Talking about the mental wall experienced in running and other popular sports

title: J.A.M. Runs Podcasts
description: This Podcast takes a dive into what it is like to be a professional runner, and what advice they have for future athletes at the elementary, middle school, high school, collegiate, and professional level.

title: Shoot the runner - Il Podcast di Running Club
description: Il primo podcast di Gabriele Impera, autore di Running Club. Si parla anche di corsa, ma soprattutto di quelle persone normali che ogni giorno possono ispirarti e aiutarti a fare grandi cose.

title: The Power Motion Picnic Hour
description: On the popular running podcast The Power Motion Picnic Hour, hosts Dave and Trevor share their experiences as 40+ year-old average runners. The listener joins them on their non-elite running journeys with frequent music-related detours, unscripted analogies, and a mile of opinions occasionally bordering on facts. Sometimes with special guests!

title: The Bailey And Harding Ultra Sound System
description: Allie Bailey and Anna Harding love running. They also love music. In this NEW podcast, the pair of them chat all things running and music. Expect embarrassing stories, silly features and a little bit of out of tune singing. It's all the fun of running with the serious bits taken out.

title: Scottish Running Podcast
description: Sean Gaffney & Peter Tucker discussing all things running related.

title: The Best Athletics Podcast
description:
Welcome to the Best Athletics podcast!

We will be bringing you regular updates from Best Athletics - including club news, upcoming races & events, regular coaches corner, member and athlete interviews alongside bringing on guests from across the running community and much more!

title: TrailRunning Ukraine
description: Розмови з атлетами, тренерами, організаторами змагань, волонтерами, фотографами, та всіма цікавими людьми з світу Українського Трейлранінгу

title: Call Room Banter
description: Welcome welcome welcome to Call Room Banter with co-hosts Ben Blankenship and Jessica Gabriel. This is a podcast where we chat about track and field through the lens of a still-competing pro athlete and a behind-the-scenes event professional.

title: TheRunningPodcast
description: TheRunningPodcast

title: Briggity Bro Bobs Running Podcast
description: Bradford and Jeremy are embarking on a new running journey! Don't let our good looks fool you, we need to get in shape asap! Join along as we embark on a bro-tastic journey finding our best running shape and hunting for fun and PR's!

title: Run Happy Podcast
description: The official run happy podcast hosted by Baxter Friedman and Charlie Rook. We are two guys that love to run and want to learn how to grow as runners and as people and always run happy. We will talk with just the two of us as well as interviewing other runners and people that can help in this field.

title: Hit The Wall
description: Welcome to Hit The Wall. A weekly(ish) podcast about running, hosted by sort-of runner Stuart and his non-running sort-of-supporting wife Aimee. Each show will focus on trying to motivate Stuart to train for his first ever marathon in May 2024, while they also chew the fat on life as parents to two children. If you're looking to learn some new running tips from this podcast, then this is not for you. If you're looking for some light relief or something to listen to while you also try and run, then stick this in your ears and enjoy the nonsense.
